OOC: How did they get on the moon so fast? '~'

IC:

Vorpal turned not to face them. His form blocked almost all the light
coming from the planet, save a small ray that shone on the pair.

Vorpal: As a matter of fact, He did. Should you doubt anything, maybe
you should ask Him personally... and hope He doesn't think you
question His orders.

He walked away, towards the construction site where the drones were
busying themselves on the future base.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightstrike/Darkfate:
> 
> The males moved closed to Vorpal and darkfate spoke "Then... Who're
ya whose claims the leadership of Unciron's minions... you so called
leader.... ???? who told you that we follow ya????? Unicron himself????"
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Nic 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Saturday, July 02, 2005 9:04 AM
>   Subject: Re: The Awakened
> 
> 
>   His call finished, Vorpal broke contact with his troops and waited for
>   them to manifest their presence.
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
>   > Darkfate/Nightstrike
>   > 
>   > "Whose named ya our leader?"hissed Darkfate whose togheter
>   Nightstrike, they had awaken in moon"Answer !!! you...
Youngling!!!!! "
>   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   >   From: Nic 
>   >   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   >   Sent: Friday, July 01, 2005 12:35 PM
>   >   Subject: The Awakened
>   > 
>   > 
>   >   Years and decades had passed. His inner circuitry, though it had
>   >   stayed in passive mode for long, still counted the nanocycles
passing
>   >   away. Then there was a small release signal, and activity
slowly came
>   >   back. First the spark containment system started emitting
data, then
>   >   the spark itself soon began to take control of its body,
gradually,
>   >   until sensory input and kinetic response were up and running.
> 
> 
>
